channel.title: Fr33sc4p3 pkz source crashing
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i need a bit of help with this source to start its a great source i love it and i dont want to change i need someone to help me find a solution to this problem the problem i have is that after a while of the server being on and with lots of players it just randomly crashes and has to be turned on again manually the error i get in the server console it
Player has been disconnected Player can not login because account is already online
Player has been disconnected Player can not login because account is already online
Player has been disconnected Player can not login because account is already online
Player has been disconnected Player can not login because account is already online
and then they cant login any more until i restart the server and ontop of that my server gets put into the offline list on server status
so is there anyway to stop this or replace the restarter completly with a different one

item.title: Fr33sc4p3 pkz source crashing
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I get this problem too… How would you go about fixing it…?

Read full topic

item.title: Fr33sc4p3 pkz source crashing
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I know you said you like this source, but you are not going to find an easy fix for that. So try downloading a more up to date source.

Read full topic
